title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open/Close project option is not always available for both P1 and P2 projects.
EB: Either both projects P1 and P2 should have the Open/Close project option available, or neither project should have it enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select both projects P1 and P2.
2. Observe that the Open/Close project option is not available for one or both of the projects.
